title: Random X

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose one of five roles and one of their abilities to take tonight.
- Perform the ability you gained during the previous day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the each day, you will be given five roles capable of killing. These roles will be capable of killing the night after you receive them. You must choose one of these roles and one of their abilities to be able to use tonight. If you do not choose one, it will be randomly decided for you.
- You may perform the ability of the role you chose yesterday the following night. Your abilities cannot result in the death of another X member. If you do end up attacking an X member, their defense will be too strong for you to kill.
